title: M.I.A. Attacks New York Times Journalist On Twitter
content: Singer posted Lynn Hirschberg’s phone number, which writer called ‘infuriating.’ By now, you may have read the rather lengthy New York Times Magazine feature on M.I.A. (and if you haven’t, well, here it is). If you’re like us, there were probably more than a few passages that made you go, “Wait, what?” Journalist Lynn Hirschberg…
